Topic.Title: "Error running script: No parameters passed to LockExit function - expected 1 parameters"    What can I do?

Posts.EditableText: Hello! I am making a text adventure game for the first time using the desktop Quest and every time I go to test the game this error appears. I can still play the game but I don't know how to fix the error. Can anyone help me? Any assistance is much appreciated.
Posts.HTML: Hello! I am making a text adventure game for the first time using the desktop Quest and every time I go to test the game this error appears. I can still play the game but I don't know how to fix the error. Can anyone help me? Any assistance is much appreciated.

Posts.EditableText:
Sounds like you are trying to lock an exit, but not saying what exit.
To lock an exit, it has to have a unique name.
Posts.HTML:
Sounds like you are trying to lock an exit, but not saying what exit.
To lock an exit, it has to have a unique name.
